comFrom: bulletbabea@...: Mon, 26 Nov 2007 14:43:38 -0800Subject:=
 RE: [EVP-ITC] Re: Mini AM/FM Hack Site





No, just in relation to the $3=
00 to a medium comment. People want answers and they will pay phenomenal fe=
es sometimes to those types just to try and get contact.
 
Mini boxes, fran=
ks boxes, hacked boxes.... It all stems from your original plans to spread =
the schematics and get people building thier own. I think R was a little mi=
ffed about the price thats all LOL.
 
As for me I think its all fine, ways =
of opening the gateway are many, we just have to find the methods that suit=
 us. The mini will continue to sell if promoted same as the other versions.=
 I just enjoy that people have options, especially those on a tighter budge=
t. As you know those things can go straight for the pocketbook when you bui=
ld them yourself.
 
I also like that some of the pressure is off of you Fra=
nk. Maybe we can get more research done on the tick tock group thing hehehe=
 since you may have more free time available soon.
 
MistyFrank Sumption <f=
ranks-boxes@...> wrote:


It wasn't my intention of keeping sales d=
own on Mini Boxes. Maybe it's the other Frank---R?

Keep up the good work=
. Frank is right. This really will save people alot of money they would spe=
nd on other things. I dont even need a box yet I am tempted to go pick up a=
 radio to hack just because you guys make it look so easy!
